codeSystems.name: GenderIdentity
codeSystems.title: Gender Identity
codeSystems.description: Changed 2021-10-27 to grouping to include unknown and refused to answer. Also removed transgender codes.

codeSystems.name: CommonSubstancesForAllergyAndIntoleranceDocumentationIncludingRefutations
codeSystems.title: Common substances for allergy and intolerance documentation including refutations
codeSystems.description: As noted in https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-32953, Drug class value set changed 2021-06-21 to align with C-CDA member value set 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1114.14

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusBirthSexCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Birth Sex Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Birth Sex Codes is a set of codes for identifying the birth sex of Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusGenderIdentityCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Gender Identity Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Gender Identity Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the gender identity of Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusInsuranceCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Insurance Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Insurance Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the source of the insurance for Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusServiceDeliveryCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Service Delivery Codes
codeSystems.description: The UDS Plus CodeSystem is an 'addition set' of one code to the existing Location Service Delivery Codes value set for UDS+ purposes.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusSexualOrientationCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Sexual Orientation Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Sexual Orientation Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the sexual orientation of Patients.

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusAgricultureWorkerStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Agriculture Worker Status Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Agriculture Worker Status Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for specifying agriculture worker status for Patients.
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-udsplus-agriculture-: UDS Plus Agriculture Worker Status Extension

codeSystems.name: UdsPlusHousingStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Uds Plus Housing Status Codes
codeSystems.description: The Uds Plus Housing Status Codes is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying the Patient's housing status.

codeSystems.name: LOINCCodes
codeSystems.title: LOINC Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all LOINC codes
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-uds-plus-clinical-re: De-Identified UDS Plus Clinical Result Observation

codeSystems.name: PatientRelationshipType
codeSystems.title: Patient relationship type
codeSystems.description: A set of codes that can be used to indicate the relationship between a Patient and a Related Person.

codeSystems.name: LanguageCodesWithLanguageAndOptionallyARegionModifier
codeSystems.title: Language codes with language and optionally a region modifier
codeSystems.description: This value set includes codes from [BCP-47](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47). This value set matches the ONC 2015 Edition LanguageCommunication data element value set within C-CDA to use a 2 character language code if one exists,   and a 3 character code if a 2 character code does not exist. It points back to [RFC 5646](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5646), however only the language codes are required, all other elements are optional.

codeSystems.name: USCoreClinicalResultObservationCategory
codeSystems.title: US Core Clinical Result Observation Category
codeSystems.description: Used to classify the context of clinical result observations.
codeSystems.StructureDefinition-uds-plus-clinical-re: De-Identified UDS Plus Clinical Result Observation

codeSystems.name: USCoreConditionCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Condition Codes
codeSystems.description: This describes the problem. Diagnosis/Problem List is broadly defined as a series of brief statements that catalog a patient's medical, nursing, dental, social, preventative and psychiatric events and issues that are relevant to that patient's healthcare (e.g., signs, symptoms, and defined conditions). ICD-10 is appropriate for Diagnosis information, and ICD-9 for historical information.

codeSystems.name: USCoreDischargeDisposition
codeSystems.title: US Core Discharge Disposition
codeSystems.description: [National Uniform Billing Committee](http://www.nubc.org/), manual UB-04, UB form locator 17.

codeSystems.name: USCoreEncounterType
codeSystems.title: US Core Encounter Type
codeSystems.description:
The type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided. This value set includes codes from SNOMED CT decending from the concept 308335008 (Patient encounter procedure (procedure)) and codes from the Current Procedure and Terminology (CPT) found in the following CPT sections:
- 99201-99499 E/M - 99500-99600 home health (mainly nonphysician, such as newborn care in home) - 99605-99607 medication management - 98966-98968 non physician telephone services
(subscription to AMA Required)

codeSystems.name: USCoreLaboratoryTestCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Laboratory Test Codes
codeSystems.description: Laboratory LOINC codes: From the introduction to August 2022 LOINC Users' guide; "The current scope of the existing laboratory portion of the LOINC  database includes all observations reported by clinical laboratories, including the specialty areas: chemistry, including therapeutic drug monitoring and toxicology; hematology; serology; blood bank; microbiology; cytology; surgical pathology; and fertility.

codeSystems.name: USCoreProcedureCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Procedure Codes
codeSystems.description: Concepts from CPT, SNOMED CT, HCPCS Level II Alphanumeric Codes, ICD-10-PCS,CDT and LOINC code systems that can be used to indicate the type of procedure performed.
